alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 3:28AM CDT until June 18 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Independence County in north central Arkansas... Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 328 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Salado to near Russell to near Pryor, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Batesville... Newport... Augusta... Bald Knob... Tuckerman... Diaz... Newark... Swifton... Patterson... Grubbs... Pleasant Plains... Oil Trough... Russell... Jacksonport... Magness... Tupelo... Moorefield... Algoa... McCrory... Salado... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
